sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- 题目名称 -->
  <el-input v-model="requestdata.titleName" placeholder="请输入题目名称" />
  <!-- 文字题干 -->
  <el-input
    v-model="requestdata.textdata"
    :autosize="{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 4 }"
    type="textarea"
    placeholder="请输入题干"
  />
  <!-- 题目额外信息 -->
  <el-input
    v-model="requestdata.description"
    :autosize="{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 4 }"
    type="textarea"
    placeholder="请输入题目额外的描述信息"
  />

  <!-- 上传图像文件 -->
  <input type="file" ref="imgFileInput" @change="handleImgFileChange" />

  <!-- 上传图形文件 -->
  <input type="file" ref="svgFileInput" @change="handleSvgFileChange" />

  <!-- 上传语音文件 -->
  <input type="file" ref="voiceFileInput" @change="handleVoiceFileChange" />

  <button @click="sendToBackend">cilck</button>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from "vue";
import axios from "@/api/request";
import { message } from "ant-design-vue";

const svgFileInput = ref(null); // 定义文件输入的引用
const imgFileInput = ref(null); // 定义文件输入的引用
const voiceFileInput = ref(null); // 定义文件输入的引用

const requestdata = ref({
  titleName: "",
  projectname: "",
  description: "",

  textdata: "",
  imgfile: "",
  svgfile: "",
  voicefile: "",
});
function print() {
  console.log(requestdata.value);
}

const handleFileChange = () => {
  requestdata.value.file = Array.from(fileInput.value.files);
  console.log(requestdata.value.file[0]);
};
const handleImgFileChange = () => {
  requestdata.value.imgfile = Array.from(imgFileInput.value.files);
};

const handleSvgFileChange = () => {
  requestdata.svgfile = $refs.svgFileInput.files[0];
};

const handleVoiceFileChange = () => {
  requestdata.voicefile = $refs.voiceFileInput.files[0];
};

const sendToBackend = () => {
  if (!requestdata.value.titleName.trim()) {
    message.error("题目名称不能为空", 2);
    return;
  }

  // 构建FormData对象
  const formData = new FormData();
  formData.append("titleName", requestdata.value.titleName);
  formData.append("titleData", requestdata.value.titleData);
  formData.append("description", requestdata.value.description);
  if (requestdata.value.file[0]) {
    formData.append("file", requestdata.value.file[0]);
  }

  console.log(requestdata.value.file);
  console.log(formData);
  // 发送POST请求
  axios
    .post("/title/add", formData)
    .then((response) => {
      console.log("success Response from backend:", response.data);
      if (response.data.success == "success") {
        message.success("添加题目成功", 2);
      } else {
        message.error(response.data.message);
      }
    })
    .catch((error) => {
      console.error("Error sending data to backend:", error.message);
    });
};
</script>
